Description:
What we’re looking for:2-3 years of experience working with SAP Sales and Distribution Module
Ability to debug ABAP code when analyzing issues is a plus
Experience with S4 HANA is a plus
Proficiency in English is required
Bachelor’s degree in technical discipline such as computer science or engineering
Ability to prioritize and resolve complex business issues
Experience working with global teams
Excellent communication skills and the ability to communicate appropriately at all levels of the organization
Strong problem solving and teamwork skills
Able to work with minimal supervisionJob Details
